name: counter-app
description: install the following packages in your Node.js project directory:  1.npm init -y  2.express - This is a popular Node.js web framework that makes it easy to handle HTTP requests and responses. You can install it using the following command:  npm install express  3.mysql - This is a Node.js library for connecting to and interacting with MySQL databases. You can install it using the following command:  npm install mysql  4.ejs - This is a templating engine that allows you to render dynamic HTML pages. You can install it using the following command:  npm install ejs  5.node app.js
author: PrasanaY
